Jay@Play’s portfolio of brands includes Vibe Girls, FlipaZoo®, Boxy Girls, Twinkle Playbrites, Twinkle Play Tents and Wish Me. Jay@Play’s innovative and creative approach to toy development has been lauded by the toy industry, media, and influencers across the country.”
